deity_category: Outer Gods and Great Old Ones
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Xhamen-Dor (The Star Seed)](/Deities.aspx?ID=165)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Xhamen-Dor, the living cancer, was born in the sewers beneath Carcosa, the alien city that is the home of [Hastur](/Deities.aspx?ID=162). Somehow, this Great Old One was transported to Golarion within a comet, crashing into the bottom of a lake during the devastation of Earthfall. Physically, it manifests as a twisting and vaguely serpentine-shaped mass of bone, hair, and fungus.

 The Inmost Blot, as Xhamen-Dor is also known, exists to conquer worlds by infecting the living with itself. Its victims, the seeded, enact its will and seek to spread its influence until the entire world is just an extension of Xhamen-Dor itself. Then, once only the seeded remain, Xhamen-Dor uses the last of the planet’s energy to return to Carcosa, which in turn absorbs the world Xhamen-Dor has brought to it, allowing Carcosa to slowly grow.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Outer Gods and Great Old Ones
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=13)

**Edicts** Spread fungal growths, subtly infect others with knowledge of Xhamen-Dor

**Anathema** None

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Decay](/Domains.aspx?ID=42), [Dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=9), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Summon Plant or Fungus](/Spells.aspx?ID=325)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)

- **7th**
[Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369)

</column>
name: Xhamen-Dor (The Star Seed)
